SEARCH
Package angryflappybird

Class Defines

java.lang.Object
angryflappybird.Defines
public class Defines extends Object
The `Defines` class encapsulates various constants and configurations used throughout the Angry Flappy Bird game. It includes dimensions, coefficients, file paths, images, sounds, and scene nodes.
Author:
Team 5

  • Constructor Details

    • Defines

      Defines()
      Constructor for the `Defines` class. Initializes images, image views, sounds, and scene nodes.

  • Method Details

    • pathImage

      public String pathImage(String filepath)
      Converts a relative image file path to an absolute path
      Parameters:
      filepath - The relative path of the image file
      Returns:
      The absolute path of the image file

    • resizeImage

      public javafx.scene.image.Image resizeImage(String filepath, int width, int height)
      Resizes an image and updates the image cache
      Parameters:
      filepath - The relative path of the image file
      width - The target width of the resized image
      height - The target height of the resized image
      Returns:
      The resized `Image` object
